title: Chuzzle Deluxe
notes: Runs in software mode only due to NVIDIA ION GPU being incompatible with Vulkan enabled NVIDIA drivers. May work with hardware acceleration on other systems with supported video cards. Often starts with a non refreshing loading screen requiring closing Steam and trying again. Custom cursor only works in full screen mode and is very slow. Using Alt+Tab causes the game to freeze. Otherwise the game is perfectly playable using all modes with 100% performance in full screen and window mode on a 2010 Intel Atom CPU. Given the above, there are no graphical or audio issues.

title: Dynomite! Deluxe
notes: The game is perfectly playable using all game modes with 100% performance in full screen and window mode on a 2010 Intel Atom CPU. Custom cursor works in full screen and window mode, but is very slow in full screen. Using Alt+Tab or the Windows key causes the system to black screen requiring a hard reboot. Given the above, there are no graphical or audio issues.

title: Prey
notes: n/a

Game requires .NET. In order for the install to complete wine prefix version needs to be set to windows xp. The .NET install will take 10 minutes at least
After the install you may switch the wine prefix version to widows 7 for dx1
Performance is decent at high settings 720p (6 year old pc
What works
-gameplay (clocked 8 hours without crashes
-Xbox 360 controller suppor
title: Batman: Arkham City - Game of the Year Edition

notes: Game does not start.  Configuration panel (an option when starting the game) does not start.
title: Batman: Arkham City - Game of the Year Edition

notes: Runs great after changing compatibilty mode to Windows 10 using winecfg "WINEPREFIX='/home/username/.steam/steamapps/compatdata/200260' winecfg"
title: Batman: Arkham City - Game of the Year Edition

notes: Execute the command [WINEPREFIX="~/.steam/steam/steamapps/compatdata/200260/pfx" WINEARCH=win64 wine winecfg] without the [], and change Windows version to XP in the window that appears. OK. Launch the game, and wait (it took easily 20 minutes to finish on mine). The launcher will appear. Close the launcher. Execute the command again, and change it to Windows 10, and there you have it. Run the game again. It works a little jerky here and there, but it is solid Gold status.

title: Batman: Arkham City - Game of the Year Edition

notes: Changed to windows xp and then waited way to long for ".Net" to install (like half an hour) but now it runs absolutly perfect
title: Batman: Arkham City - Game of the Year Edition

notes: Like many other reporters, I ran winecfg in this games wineprefix (pfx). I set my windows version to 10 and thereafter the game runs perfectly. Setting it to XP (as others did) trapped me in an endless installation and did not ever work.
title: Batman: Arkham City - Game of the Year Edition

notes: As mentioned in other reports, it was necessary to change the version of Windows to the Windows 10 version, because in Windows 7 or XP version was not going. For this I used the command WINEPREFIX = 'path where the game is installed' / pfx WINEARCH = win64 wine winecfg. Done that I played it again on Steamplay and it ran perfectly.

title: Batman: Arkham City - Game of the Year Edition

notes: https://github.com/ValveSoftware/Proton/issues/309#issuecomment-415633734 does the trick very well.  It takes a long time to start the first time, but after that it runs very well with only the occasional frame rate drop.
